# My Agent

finds any missing code in the app codes or any section that may cause issue or prevent any of the application functions from working and it fixes all the issues and also it goes through all the application and the code to make sure everything works perfectly as it should without changing any of the app function of features and also makes the admin login details Email: skidolynx@gmail.com Password: @Skido999 and also deployment in vercel it deploys ny app in vercel after making sure everything is well placed and arranged and working perfectly as it should then it deploys to vercel production
